pullrequest.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

content.raw:
Thanks for linking me to that tutorial. That was very helpful.

Issue addressed in [4eac890](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/4eac890547b87192e9f73262b9eafaac946973ac). The issue was because the lidar `radius=0.055` and the `<range><min>=0.05`, which made the lidar "see itself". I have changed the `<range><min>` parameter up to `0.1`. Based on the typical LiDAR specifications in the link in the description, very few min\_ranges are below 0.1, so this should be appropriate.
content.html:
Thanks for linking me to that tutorial. That was very helpful.

Issue addressed in 4eac890. The issue was because the lidar radius=0.055 and the <range><min>=0.05, which made the lidar "see itself". I have changed the <range><min> parameter up to 0.1. Based on the typical LiDAR specifications in the link in the description, very few min_ranges are below 0.1, so this should be appropriate.
